entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:17 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
